I am trying to unit test some DB code, have read alot of the previous 
posts and Richard Dallaway's article on the subject. One question 
that remains unanswered.

Will it work OK to use one type of DB in production (Oracle, in my 
case) and another type of DB to test against (something free, like 
mySQL)? I am nowhere near a SQL Guru. Couldn't we have some SQL that 
didn't work for both systems, or is that rare?
